title: Rollback production deployment from Version 6 to Version 5

requirements.text: Roll back the live production site from Version 6 to the previously deployed Version 5 (production rollback only; do not change the draft/codebase).
acceptanceCriteria: The public production URL serves the Version 5 build (not Version 6).
No code changes are introduced as part of the rollback; only the production deployment target changes.
After rollback, core pages (Home, Daily Verse, Stories, Testament pages) load successfully in an anonymous/signed-out session.

constraints: Do not modify application source code, backend state/schema, or assets as part of this request; this is a production rollback only.
Follow the projectâ€™s documented deployment/production procedures (see frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md) while performing the rollback.
nonGoals: Restoring or rewinding the draft/codebase to Version 5 for future development (the user selected production rollback only).
Implementing new features or bug fixes in either frontend or backend.
